description.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that hits
first and causes
flinching. Usable
only on 1st turn.
description.diamond-pearl:
An attack that hits
first and makes the
target flinch.
This move works only
on the first turn.

An attack that hits
first and makes the
target flinch.
This move works only
on the first turn.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
An attack that hits
first and makes the
target flinch. It only
works the first turn
the user is in battle.

An attack that hits first and makes the

description.sword-shield:
This attack hits first and makes the target flinch.
It only works the first turn each time the user
enters battle.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Causes the target to flinch.  Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
effect.shortEffect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.  Causes the target to flinch.
